Articles.Content: Indiana Jones finds it and brings it to my house.

I follow it to the volcano.

My Volcano

I snag the cookie and run off to my super-duper-secret-hiding-place-of-super-duper-secrecy in a super-duper-secret-location-of-super-duper-secrecy.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-21T21:55:25Z" title="02/21/2017 09:55  PM" data-short="7 yr">February 21, 2017</time> by The Raging Sandwich**
  
Whoops, another page.

Well looks like nothing's happened to our world.

Squared's and my world

> 7 minutes ago, DarkOwl57 said:
> 
> 
> Well looks like nothing's happened to our world.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Squared's and my world
> 

[@Nailed it!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/162067-nailed-it/) destroyed your world by importing the galactic core supernova from Larry Niven's Known Space, no? Then they started a bandersnatch colony, after which they began fighting over software and cookies.

Speaking of bandersnatchi, I genetically modify a bacterium to infect and kill bandersnatchi. I'm not *evil*, however, so I immediately destroy all samples and store the DNA code ingrained on a piece of glass I then keep in my pocket, encrypted with a password that only I know. However, I do have this as backup against the Bandersnatchi.

My somewhat shared hill.

I just find i hill in the most lost and cold part of Russia (where i live) 

MY COLD AND LONELY HILL!

A volcano wakes up and the cold hill disappears.

While a warm hill remains in the second-most warm part of Russia (where I live). So, the hill is still here.
